channel.label: All Events Trigger
channel.description: Triggers on all GDS events

channel.label: Open Door via Card Event Trigger
channel.description: Indicates that someone opens the door via card or key fob.

channel.label: Open Door via Card (over Wiegand) Event Trigger
channel.description: Indicates that someone opens the door via card or key fob using Wiegand interface connected to GDS.

channel.label: Visiting Log Event Trigger
channel.description: Indicates that door has been opened for visitor which pressed door bell button.

channel.label: Open Door via Universal PIN Event Trigger
channel.description: Indicates that door has been opened successfully using local PIN code via GDS keypad.

channel.label: Open Door via Private PIN Event Trigger
channel.description: Indicates that someone opened the door successfully using their private PIN code via GDS keypad.

channel.label: Open Door via Guest PIN Event Trigger
channel.description: Indicates that a guest used “Guest PIN” code to open the door using GDS keypad.

channel.label: Open Door via DI Event Trigger
channel.description: Indicates that door has been opened using DI (Digital Input) Signal, such as using a push button.

channel.label: Call Out Log Event Trigger
channel.description: Indicates the GDS unit initiated a call out, for example when someone uses the keypad to dial a number or press door bell button which preconfigured destination number.

channel.label: Call In Log Event Trigger
channel.description: Indicates that call has been received by the GDS unit.

channel.label: Call Log (Door Bell Call) Event Trigger
channel.description: Indicates that someone has initiated a call using door bell button.

channel.label: Open Door via Card and PIN Event Trigger
channel.description: Indicates that someone used his RFID card or key fob, plus his own private password to authenticate and open the door.

channel.label: Keep Door Open (Immediately) Event Trigger
channel.description: Key door Open (immediately) action has been performed from the web Interface.

channel.label: Keep Door Open (Scheduled) Event Trigger
channel.description: Key door Open (immediately) action has been set from the web Interface and the event is triggered.

channel.label: Open Door via Remote PIN Event Trigger
channel.description: Indicates that someone did send remote PIN code to open the door using GDS manager tool for example.

channel.label: HTTP API Open Door Event Trigger
channel.description: Indicates that someone did send remote PIN code to open the door HTTP API command.

channel.label: Motion Detection Event Trigger
channel.description: Indicates that motion detection is triggered.

channel.label: DI Alarm Event Trigger
channel.description: Indicates that alarm IN is triggered.

channel.label: Dismantle by Force Event Trigger
channel.description: Indicates that the unit has been dismantled by force.

channel.label: System up Event Trigger
channel.description: Indicates that the system is UP

channel.label: Reboot Event Trigger
channel.description: Indicates that the GDS unit has been rebooted.

channel.label: Reset (Clear All Data) Event Trigger
channel.description: Factory reset (clear all data) has been performed.

channel.label: Reset (Retain Network Data Only) Event Trigger
channel.description: Factory reset (Retain Network Data Only) has been performed.

channel.label: Reset (Retain Only Card Information) Event Trigger
channel.description: Factory reset (Retain Only Card Information) has been performed.

channel.label: Reset (Retain Network Data and Card Information) Event Trigger
channel.description: Factory reset (Retain Network Data and Card Information) has been performed.

channel.label: Reset (Wiegand) Event Trigger
channel.description: Factory reset using Wiegand module has been performed on the unit.

channel.label: Config Update Event Trigger
channel.description: Indicates that the system’s configuration has been updated.

channel.label: Firmware Update (1.0.0.0) Event Trigger
channel.description: Indicates that the system’s firmware has been upgraded.

channel.label: Hostage Alarm Event Trigger
channel.description: Indicates that someone has entered the hostage alarm PIN code to open the door.

channel.label: Invalid Password Event Trigger
channel.description: Indicates that someone has entered wrong password PIN code to open the door for 5 attempts and corresponding alarm action has been triggered.

channel.label: Mainboard Temperature(32°C) Normal Event Trigger
channel.description: Indicates that device’s mainboard temperature is normal, (around 32°C).

channel.label: Mainboard Temperature(32°C) Too Low Event Trigger
channel.description: Indicates that device’s mainboard temperature is to low.

channel.label: Mainboard Temperature(32°C) Too High Event Trigger
channel.description: Indicates that device’s mainboard temperature is to high.

channel.label: Sensor Temperature(32°C) Normal Event Trigger
channel.description: Indicates that device’s sensor temperature is normal, (around 32°C).

channel.label: Sensor Temperature(32°C) Too Low Event Trigger
channel.description: Indicates that device’s sensor temperature is to low.

channel.label: Sensor Temperature(32°C) Too High Event Trigger
channel.description: Indicates that device’s sensor temperature is to high.

parameter.name: url
parameter.label: GDS URL
parameter.description: URL of the GDS web UI in the form of http://yourhost or https://yourhost.

parameter.name: username
parameter.label: GDS User Name
parameter.description: The user name used to log into the GDS web UI. Defaults to "admin".

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: GDS Password
parameter.description: The password used to log into the GDS web UI.

parameter.name: refreshSeconds
parameter.label: GDS Refresh Interval
parameter.description: How frequently in seconds to poll the GDS for updates

parameter.name: modifyGdsConfig
parameter.label: Modify GDS Configuration
parameter.description: By Default the binding will attempt to update the GDS to have it send events to openHAB. Disabling this will require manual configuration of the GDS through it's web UI.

channel-type.label: Keeps Door Open
channel-type.description: Keeps the door open for amount of time in minutes

channel-type.label: Digital Input
channel-type.description: Contact state of the digital input alarm
